Text: Re POCCC Final Cash Call MUY IMPORTANTE Cc Marc We have not met but I purchased John Clinchs unit about two months ago I wanted to contact you to get your input as to my situation Currently I have three issues with my unit The granite has not been installed The back splash in the kitchen and bathroom is not in The mini blinds are not in Most of my punch list has been completed but a few items are outstanding These are of less importance that the first two items and I realize that I got into the unit late so the crew could be behind I have already paid for the granite and its installation Can you give me an update as to where we stand on getting this completed as it is the largest outstanding item John asked for payment on the last cash call but I have a problem in that if these items are not going to be completed it will cost me approximately to replace the items which I have already paid for I would like to get everything settled and move forward Can you give me some information about the above and your recommendation Thanks Tim John R Wallace wrote So far only of us that would include me have paid their final cash call to Port OConnor Country Club LP Deer is waiting patiently for a significant amount of money and he has subcontractors that are very anxious The final cash calls were mailed to you back on October th and are due NOW If you didnt get your big package from my office containing all your condo closing documents and a separate envelope marked FINAL CASH CALL please i check with your partner since I only sent out one package per unit ii go check your mailbox again iii talk to your wife and iv once you have done all that call me and Ill try to fix you up with another set If you have any questions regarding the cash call after reading your package thoroughly give me a call Thank you all for your very prompt attention to this matter John Wallace The information contained in this email message is intended only for the personal and confidential use of the recipients named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that you have received this document in error and that any review dissemination distribution or copying of this message is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately by email and delete the original message burkettvcf
